author: administrator
body:
Welcome in your brand new QUANTA Homepage. That's where everything begins!

To have you started soon, we created for you some sample content such as a [LINK|title=animal blog:animals] and a [LINK|title=fruits carousel:fruits].

All the documentation you need to get started is in the [LINK|link_target=blank|protocol=https|title=Quanta website:www.quantacms.com/documentation].
title: Your Homepage
